name: clothes_type
description: What type of material should be used for clothes and hair?
label: Clothes type
items: Use a simplistic PBR-style material, without any procedural aspects at all. This is geared towards export to external applications.
Use a PBR-style material, relying mostly on image textures and with few procedural aspects. This supports more of the general PBR model than the GameEngine material.
